TextView.android:text: The SDK for Android 4.0.1 (Ice Cream Sandwich), based on Linux kernel 3.0.1,[95] was publicly released on October 19, 2011.[96] Google's Gabe Cohen stated that Android 4.0 was with any Android 2.3.x device in production at that time.[97] The source code for Android 4.0 became available on November 14, 2011.[98] Ice Cream Sandwich was the last version to officially support Adobe Systems' Flash player.[99] The update introduced numerous new features:[100][101][102]
